items.abstract: <jats:p>The article describes the features of the course of atopic dermatitis during pregnancy. The results of our investigation devoted to the state of the skin barrier in pregnant women with atopic dermatitis and healthy pregnant women are represented. We elucidate the advanced ideas of the feasibility of treatment atopic dermatitis during gestation</jats:p>
